website_summaries.verdict: Good price for a set that has plenty of extra equipment. Heavy-duty materials will last a long time.
pros: Set ships with enough flags and belts for 14 players (two teams of seven)
3 flags for each belt for an optimum game play experience
Long belts fit both kids and adults with a D-ring closure
Mesh carrying bag holds all equipment
cons: Hook and loop pads may not stay attached to the belts and flags when placed under stress

customer_reviews.title: Coaches Choice
customer_reviews.text: I use these cones for a U12 girls club team. They are a sturdy, pliable plastic that stands up to abuse. Not flimsy brittle plastic that breaks easily. The "tower" they come with makes it easy to carry while setting up the field and the mesh bag is great for keeping them from dumping all over the inside of my bag/car. I'd recommend to any coach.
customer_reviews.author: J Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Not super impressed.
customer_reviews.text: While I wasn't expecting excellent quality for the price, I probably would not have purchased if I had seen it in a store. It does do the job, but the belts came with creases that makes them fold in and there were only enough for 12, not 14.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Stubbs

customer_reviews.title: Does What it needs to
customer_reviews.text: All I wanted was some simple flags for flag football and this does the job. This set was by far the cheapest one I could find and also has 14 belts as well. All of the flags are pretty sturdy, they're basically vinyl material while the belts are nylon. My only complaint is the clip for the belts is difficult for kids to operate and requires an adult putting the belts on them, but they stay put once they're on.
customer_reviews.author: David Michael Xanatos

customer_reviews.title: these are probably the best soccer cones of ever work with
customer_reviews.text: I have been coaching youth soccer as a full-time occupation since 1986, these are probably the best soccer cones of ever work with. Easy to handle, throw to the ground, and to pick up. I have put several sets and I plan on buying several more for my coaching staff.
customer_reviews.author: James O.

customer_reviews.title: Quick set up and play
customer_reviews.text: Good kit, great price. This flag football kit made it easy for my friends and family to get together and quickly set up and play football. The belts were a little bit of a challenge for a few people. The field markers are a bonus. My package arrived on time and in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: mikmik3mik

customer_reviews.title: Product ok but came delivered “a mess”!
customer_reviews.text: Product itself good. Box it came in was in bad shape. Especially for a gift! See pic. It was packaged poorly in a box with a case of 24 11.5 oz v8 juice cans!!!! Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Ng

customer_reviews.title: Great Kid and family Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons 10thbirthday party. The boys had a blast. Flags attached well, but were not too hard to rip off. I will say, I should have taken 10 minutes to undue all of the rubber bands, tape and wrapped flags. They were bundled very well and I should have undone them all ahead of time. The 10 year olds had a hard time. But overall it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cheikh

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for my son and his friends
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my son and his friends. They durable and will last. The flags Velcro to the belts.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the style of closure
customer_reviews.text: Wish these came with buckles, too hard for little kids to put on themselves with the ring closure.
customer_reviews.author: Big Mike

customer_reviews.title: My students love using these flag belts during recess
customer_reviews.text: My students love using these flag belts during recess! I just wish the loops that the flags velcro onto were stitched to the belt, because they keep falling off.
customer_reviews.author: knappstert

customer_reviews.title: Belt size doesn’t matter.  Not for men with 38” waist or larger.
customer_reviews.text: Belts are 46” but barely fits man with 38” waist.
customer_reviews.author: Emily F.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly what you would expect for the price. With that being said, they are a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Pearson

customer_reviews.title: No carry case but these will be perfect for capture the flag or flag football
customer_reviews.text: No carry case but these will be perfect for capture the flag or flag football. Very excited because it helps for a big group of people.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Moldy/dirty flag belts
customer_reviews.text: I got this set for my son and I just opened the box to find moldy/dirty flag belts! I am very disappointed in this product and would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cones and carry stem are great...bag not so much
customer_reviews.text: This product is as described and the primary product aka the cones are great. Also the carrying rod is a smart touch. The only reason this product received 3 stars was the carrying bag provided broke within 5 minutes of using it. I'll use another bag so not a big deal but otherwise the cones are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: ALL RED flags. Only 4 blue flags sent.
customer_reviews.text: Ugh. Thankful that I opened the box before the party as it contained ONLY 4 blue flags and 10 red. Looks like decent flags but will have to go through the hassle of returning since it is not as described. You need equal amount of flags per team. And now I'm shopping again.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: for my son's birthday party
customer_reviews.text: Many of the flags fell off and some ripped. Worked okay for one-time use.
customer_reviews.author: CLC

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it and enjoy making up different games to play
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Just as I hoped they would be 😉
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a team at the YMCA and they are really great, me and the team are happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Makkaroy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good set, nice quality. We played adults and kids and they worked for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: Flag Football or Capture The Flag
customer_reviews.text: Used these to play a large camp wide Capture the flag game and all had a blast!!! Haven't used it for football. 73 W9CTR
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great set for game day, birthday parties or a quick kids pick up game!
customer_reviews.author: E. enns

customer_reviews.title: Kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: Works great for kids and adults. Flags stay on well yet can be torn off easily enough.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the tabs that attach to the flags. They should be sewn to the belt. Constantly come off belt.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mejia

customer_reviews.title: tough, light and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Good value for price. They are tough light and cheap. Very bright and the carrier and bag are a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: D. Negrich

customer_reviews.title: THEY LOVED IT!
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my son's birthday party..group of 12 year old/pewee pop warner players...THEY LOVED IT!! played all evening!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product worth the price! Played on a windy day and the cones didn't fly away with the wind; nice to have 12 cones!
customer_reviews.author: Elbori

customer_reviews.title: ... to a 9 year old and he was so happy and excited he couldn’t wait to play it with ...
customer_reviews.text: Was given as a birthday gift to a 9 year old and he was so happy and excited he couldn’t wait to play it with his friends!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Have not had any issues yet but only used twice.
customer_reviews.author: maitt123

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids are having fun playing flag football with this item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product + Fast Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great product and very fast shipping from company. Opted for standard shipping--it arrived 2 days later. Would highly recommend them for future buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Sathya Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pack and use.
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping! Product as promised! Standard practice cones, comes in handy packing net and holder.
customer_reviews.author: Todd E. Hausman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: flags work great and there are plenty of cones to mark the field
customer_reviews.author: Robert  W. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Good product as stated
customer_reviews.text: Good product as stated. Very fast shipping even to Hong Kong -- ordered on 8-June and arrived on 11-June with standard shipping. Would highly recommend them for future buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Chan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and out them right to use. Seem to be holding up great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flag Football Throwdown
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for the Family Reunion Turkey Day Bowl. Cones came in handy marking the field.
customer_reviews.author: OConnor Family

customer_reviews.title: Great product for multirotor (drone) competitions
customer_reviews.text: Great product for multirotor (drone) competitions. The are very visible through FPV gear and help pilots see the course layout as they compete.
customer_reviews.author: SBRC_Pilot

customer_reviews.title: satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, we had a game at the park and the flags hold up. It is fun to use
customer_reviews.author: Karen Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Xmas present
customer_reviews.text: Boy hasn't played with it yet that I know of
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Comeaux:))

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have enough for myself and a few others should they want to join in on my pre-game drills.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for your quick send!! They are exactly what I needed..
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I've coached soccer for over 20 years. These type of cones can get expensive, but this product was a huge bange for the buck. I don't need to "ration" my use anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Good bang for your buck. Fast shipping and was exactly as described!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Cicerone

customer_reviews.title: They tore the first time we tried to use them ...
customer_reviews.text: They tore the first time we tried to use them. I plan to sew the flags back onto the velcro and hope they will hold.
customer_reviews.author: Michele L Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Quality product. Flexible cones, solid carrier. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Flexible cones, solid carrier. I don't really use the bag, I just put a spring clip on top of the carrier to hold the cones on in case it tips over in transit.
customer_reviews.author: Daren Kaneshiro

customer_reviews.title: Family Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for family fun at the upcoming holidays!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Hargett

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and as expected.
customer_reviews.text: The bright colors are great on th soccer pitch. The carrying case is a nice touch for transport and to keep them organized.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent !!!!! Delivery was fast and the cones are exactly what was advertised. Great Job!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for practicing slow speed motorcycle skills too!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a new Harley Davidson Road Glide Special motorcycle after a 20 year break from riding. I got these cones to set up a MSF-ish course to practice my slow speed skills. These work great! They don't stick up and get caught in the bike or bother me turning near them. If I ride over one it dents and easily pops back into shape and are very light and stackable to fit in my saddlebags. These will also come in handy when I teach my sons to ride. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Adirondack Bob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price, and great service. Will by from here again.
customer_reviews.author: SRM

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to anyone!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! They were shipped quickly and put on the field shortly thereafter!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t like the design so I returned it
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the design so I returned it. The flags are permanently fixed so you actually pull off the entire belt when you “pull the flag.”
customer_reviews.author: GIJaynee

customer_reviews.title: We ordered these for a church soccer camp. They ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these for a church soccer camp. They came packaged just as shown and worked exactly how we needed them to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They're, um, cones. They seem to be doing what they're supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got them in a timely fashion and they were just as advertised. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is good. Shipped quickly and love the the hook they are on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived timely and complete. Good quality belts and flags. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: James Hagemann

customer_reviews.title: Good set of cones with metal holder
customer_reviews.text: Disc cones were good quality and a great price. They came with a metal stand which is much nicer than the cheap plastic ones that are normally sent with cones. I run a soccer league, and these will work great for the teams. Also included was a mesh back, which will be handy as well. I will buy these again if we need more.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Cones great. Bag poor
customer_reviews.text: Cones and carrier are made of good quality. Flexible and strong. No issues whatsoever. Does come with a mesh bag. The mesh bag is really poor. It ripped 30 seconds after using it. I put in the cones and lifted to carry it and ripped. Oh well. Cones are great
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine Keller

customer_reviews.title: FPV race track
customer_reviews.text: These cones work great. They are bright colored and easy to see through the camera of my quadcopter. I will be recommending these to all the other FPV pilots that are looking for track markers.
customer_reviews.author: Thumper76

customer_reviews.title: It was packaged very nicely and I was impressed how nice it looked for ...
customer_reviews.text: It was packaged very nicely and I was impressed how nice it looked for the price. It looks like it will hold up. It is going to be used in a school during recess so we will see.
customer_reviews.author: lisad92

customer_reviews.title: Drone Racing Companion
customer_reviews.text: Top Notch, they wont budge, even in high winds, very Impressed. Perfect for laying a flight path.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great set, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it! Will make for lots of great games with friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive sports training cones
customer_reviews.text: They arrived on time and came with a rack to hold all of them. Nice and light but the low profile helps to make them wind resistant. Like the bright colors and the yellow/orange mix allows you to set up agility drills easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for 100 cones
customer_reviews.text: Great price and just wanted we needed for our scouting event. They appear to be a good quality plastic and brightly colored
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

product_meta.title: 14 Player Flag Football Deluxe Set - 14 Belts, 42 Flags, 12 Cones & 1 Mesh Carrying Bag for Flag Football
feature_bullets: MORE BELTS & MORE FLAGS - This complete flag football set comes with 14 belts, each with 3 flags, (secured by hook and loop fasteners) you can enjoy a game with up to 14 players. Brightly colored Red and Blue football flags make it easy to tell which player is on which team.
MORE CONES - Includes 12 large, highly visibility disc cones so you can clearly mark the goal lines, playing field, and sidelines.
EXTRA DURABLE - These belts, cones, and flags for flag football are made with heavy duty, durable materials designed to withstand years of rough, rowdy games.

ENDLESS OUTDOOR FUN - Perfect flag football belts for kids and adults! Belts feature a sturdy, adjustable D-ring and will fit almost any player. Great for parties, family reunions, summer camps and more!
LIFETIME REPLACEMENT WARRANTY - Play Platoon stands behind its Flag Football Set 100%. If anything ever goes wrong with this, we will replace it with a new one.
